svcsubproc.title: Vandal Lock
svcsubproc.para: The vandal lock option is located forward of the side entry door below the passenger side windshield wing panel. To remove the vandal lock assembly the passenger side of the dash panel must be removed.

step1.para: Beginning at the passenger side wing panel glass, locate the mounting screw and tab for the passenger entry dash panel.
Remove the mounting screws on the forward, leading edge of the dash panel assembly.

figure.caption: Figure 173. Dash Panel Remove to Access Vandal Lock

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. DASH PANEL FORWARD EDGE MOUNTING SCREW LOCATION
2. WING PANEL AND CLUSTER MOUNTING SCREW LOCATION
3. RIGHT WING PANEL AND ENTRY MOUNTING SCREW LOCATION
4. ENTRY STEP WELL DASH MOUNTING SCREW

step1.para: Locate the mounting screws along the bottom edge of the dash panel and remove.
Lift the dash panel up and out of the way.
Locate the vandal lock assembly on the interior panel forward of the passenger entry and over the cross bus beam.
Disconnect the wire connections to the vandal lock assembly.

figure.caption: Figure 174. Disconnect Wire Connections- Vandal Lock

step1.para: Loosen the vandal lock interior surface lock jam nut.
Loosen and remove the exterior trim ring on vandal lock key shaft.
Loosen the lock ring on the outside body panel section of the vehicle, remove the nut and washer.
Remove the vandal lock assembly out of the mounting hole from inside.
